description: This file provides utility functions for splitting strings into linked list structures, including internal validation and processing.

methods.name: split
methods.description: Splits a source string into tokens based on spaces and stores valid tokens into a linked list.

methods.name: addIfValid
methods.description: Adds a token to the linked list if it passes validation.

methods.name: isTokenValid
methods.description: Checks if the token is non-empty.
